item.title: Tenancy Dispute, Perth
item.description: PDF, videos, contract case-15.02.20.pdf case-15.02.20.zip Application of a court order to the Magistrates Court of Western Australia Documents attached Residential Tenancies Act 1987 Lease agreement This is in the folder named contract. Evidence of cockroach infestation This is in the folder named evidence-of-cockroaches. Terminology Apartment: The Queens Gardens apartment (Unit 2, 60-64 Forrest Ave) People involved Name Full legal name Phone number Neha Parveen Bhatia +61 444 513 647 Kit Yuen Kit, Chui +61 413 608 281 Shane Shane Christopher Mulligan +61 421 641 250 Agreed duration of my lease 11 Feb 2020 - 13 Feb 2020.
